title: Orange-Ginger and Lime Pickle Dipping Sauce
full_text:
Orange-Ginger and Lime Pickle Dipping Sauce
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2/3
cup
Indian-style
hot lime pickle
(such as Patak's)
1/3
cup
orange juice
1
(1/2-inch) knob
peeled
ginger
2
tablespoons
sliced
scallions
Directions
Combine lime pickle, orange juice, and ginger in a blender. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute, scraping down sides and watering down with water as necessary. Transfer to a dipping bowl, garnish with scallions, and serve with fried chicken.

Blender
